HeroHome.title: Move freely with Beam
HeroHome.description: Change the future starting with yourself by using Beam now.

Mission.text1: We have a mission to turn small journeys into better journeys, and

Priority.title: Sustainability
Priority.description: Beam is the only operator in the Asia-Pacific with Climate Neutral Certification. And because we’re committed to going further, we’re determined to achieve Carbon Negative by 2025.

Vehicle.title: Vehicles
Vehicle.description: Our electric scooters and bikes, designed for sharing, provide a comfortable and reliable riding experience tailored to your daily needs.

FeatureHome.title: Group Travel
FeatureHome.description: Enjoy exciting trips with friends and family using the Group Travel feature, where you can ride together using a single account. This feature is available in select cities.

News.title: Latest News
News.description: Stay updated with the latest news and exciting updates about our city, community, and programs.

news.description: Beam accelerates growth with a 36% surge in gross revenue, achieving adjusted EBITDA profitability.
Beam initiates pedestrian shield technology integration.

Partnership.title: Reimagining your city.
Partnership.description: We want to partner with you to drive something new today.

partnerships.title: Collaborating, with cities
partnerships.subtitle: We are fully committed to partnering with governments at all levels to make city life work better for everyone.

partnerships.title: Partnering, with us
partnerships.subtitle: Wherever we operate, we strive to grow our operations through collaboration with local communities.

partnerships.title: Beam safety academy
partnerships.subtitle: We work hard to ensure every Beam user is mindful of the riding environment and uses shared city spaces responsibly.

HelpHome.title: Still have questions?
HelpHome.description: If you want to learn more about Beam or are interested in partnering with us, we are happy to assist you. Contact us now and let's create something great together.
